keyInsight.title: Key insight: Match the right person to the right problem
keyInsight.notSure: Not sure? Let's talk it through

problems.title: Two problems, two solutions
problems.subtitle: Whether you're a developer or leader, you're losing time on tasks AI could handle.
problems.highlight: We give everyone the right tools for their level.

items.title: Developers: Time wasted on repetitive work
items.description: 3-week onboarding, endless manual reviews, outdated documentation. Your developers spend 4+ hours daily on tasks AI could automate instantly.

items.title: Leaders: Endless wait for development
items.description: "Maybe in Q3" for a simple client dashboard. You need internal tools, automations, dashboards, but the IT team is overwhelmed. Meanwhile, you do everything manually.

items.title: Everyone: AI is too complex to implement
items.description: CrewAI, MCP, Claude-code... Where to start? How to integrate without breaking existing systems? You want AI benefits, but not 6 months learning and configuring everything.

problems.bottomText: Time to give everyone the right AI tools

solution.title: Our Approach: Enhance, Don't Replace
solution.subtitle: We install AI systems that integrate with your existing tools.
solution.highlight: No learning curve. No process changes. Just more efficiency.

steps.title: We assess your current situation
steps.description: Complete audit of your existing processes - development, project management, business tools. We identify exactly where AI can have the greatest impact based on your profile (technical or business).

steps.title: We integrate without disrupting
steps.description: Installation of AI systems adapted to your track. For developers: advanced agent orchestration. For leaders: secure no-code environment. Everything works with your current tools.

steps.title: We measure and support
steps.description: Continuous performance metrics tracking. Regular system optimization. Permanent technical support. Updates with latest AI capabilities. Your success is our priority.

codeExample.title: Example: Automated code review (Developer Track)
codeExample.description: Here's how we automate code reviews with CrewAI and Claude-code

solution.bottomText: We enhance • We integrate • We measure • We support

services.title: Services By Track
services.subtitle: Specific solutions for developers and leaders.
services.highlight: We measure results, we don't promise.

packages.title: Developer Track - Starter
packages.subtitle: Agent orchestration for small teams
packages.description: Installation of a Claude agent system to automate code reviews, documentation generation, and testing. Perfect for discovering the power of AI orchestration.
features: Agents for automatic review and documentation

packages.title: Business Track - Autonomy
packages.subtitle: No-code environment for leaders
packages.description: Configuration of a secure AI environment to build your own client dashboards, internal tools and automations. No more waiting for the IT team.

packages.title: Enterprise - Both Tracks
packages.subtitle: Complete tech + business solution
packages.description: Combination of both tracks: advanced agent orchestration for devs + business environment for leaders. Complete organization boosted by AI.

services.bottomText: Each track adapted to specific needs. Impact measurements included.

cta.title: Ready to unlock your potential?
cta.subtitle: Free assessment adapted to your profile. We'll analyze your needs and show you
cta.highlight: exactly what you can build with AI.
cta.description: Free assessment with no sales pitch. Just actionable insights about your needs and possible solutions.
cta.guarantee: No selling, no commitment, just solutions
